objects.text:
• 925 Sterling Silver with Rose Gold Finish
• Elegant Pink Drop Crystal Design
• Perfect Gift for Someone Special

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This elegant banner design promotes a pair of rose gold wreath stud earrings using a soft, romantic aesthetic. The layout features a left-aligned information panel with key promotional text layers (e.g., `"heading"`, `"subheading"`, `"description"`, `"tagline_1"`, `"tagline_2"`, `"price"`) in varying shades of pink and mauve, drawing attention to the product benefits and price. A call-to-action button (`"cta"` over `"cta_background"`) stands out in bright rose pink with bold white text. The right side showcases a high-resolution product image (`"product_image"`) against a soft radial gradient background that transitions from lavender blush to pale pink. Decorative soft particles and abstract strokes enhance the luxury feel. Supporting trust and rating elements (`"warranty_info"`, `"rating"`) anchor the bottom left, making the banner both visually appealing and informative.

**Color Palette:**
- Rose Pink: `#E75480`
- Soft Blush: `#FFF5F8`
- Mauve: `#D96C90`
- Charcoal Brown: `#7D5A5A`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Gradient shades (background): `#FFF0F5` → `#FADADD`, `#F8C3CD` → `#E4ACB5`
product_color: The product image showcases elegantly designed earrings using a soft, feminine color palette. The dominant color is a lustrous Rose Gold (#EFA6AA), which outlines the structure and adds warmth. The transparent gemstones create a radiant contrast with bright Diamond White (#FFFFFF) and subtle Crystal Gray (#D8D8D8). A touch of Light Pink (#F9CCD3) gives a gentle, floral accent to the petal shapes. These hues are harmoniously blended with the rose gold base highlighting the gems without overpowering them. For an ad banner, this palette invokes elegance, romance, and luxury — ideal for targeting stylish and sophisticated audiences.
